column1: The Pit Room////I was looking through some Yelp suggestions on my home page
column2: and that's when I came across The Pit Room. Reading all the reviews and salivating over the photos of BBQ
column3: I quickly shared the page with my husband. He said
column4: "the Pit Room--yeah I've been there before. It's pretty good." Wait a second...what?!? You've "been there before" without me
column5: and didn't bother to bring leftovers?!? Once I got over the initial shock of betrayal
column6: he offered to go pick up some food for takeout.
